properties.entry: INSERT INTO MEMBER ( USER_NO , USER_ID , USER_PWD , USER_NAME , BIRTHDAY , GENDER , EMAIL ) VALUES ( SEQ_UNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )

SELECT USER_NO , USER_ID , USER_PWD , USER_NAME , USER_TYPE , GRADE , BIRTHDAY , GENDER , EMAIL , PHONE , PROFILE_IMG , NICKNAME , INTRO , MODIFY_DATE , SCRAP_COUNT , LIKE_COUNT , FOL_COUNT , ENROLL_DATE , STATUS FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_ID = ? AND USER_PWD = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
